"Rhett, I'm coming!" You shout. "There's something else below! We have to finish this quickly!"

"We'll double team 'em!" Nel responds. He draws the attention of the adjacent crawlers, which turn toward him, pincers gnashing. Vision's joining you in combat, already firing screaming bolts of blue light at your target from a safe distance.
